DataElement.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Do Housework Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's response to a question about their ability to do their own housework.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: OARS Multidimensional Functional Assessment IADL Questionnaire Do Housework
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire that seeks information both on a person's level of functioning and on their need and utilization of services._A section of the Older Americans Resource Scale Multidimensional Functional Assessment Questionnaire (OMFAQ) that seeks information about a person's functional ability to conduct the complex activities of daily living that allow for independent living within a community._A question about whether an individual is able to do housework.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: are you completely unable to do any housework?

ValueMeaning.preferredName: are you completely unable to do any housework?
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is completely unable to do something.: A question about whether an individual is able to do housework.

A question about whether an individual is able to do housework.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: with some help (can do light housework but need help with heavy work)

A question about whether an individual is able to do housework.
